### Part 1-A
```{r}
library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)
library(datasets)

data(iris)
head(iris)
summary(iris)
View(iris)

mytree <- rpart( Species ~ Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width + Petal.Length + Petal.Width, iris, method = "class" )  

rpart.plot(mytree, extra=104, fallen.leaves=T, type=4, main="Iris Dataset Decision Tree")
```
